author: Scarecr0w12
description: A collection of AI-powered cogs for Red-DiscordBot, including SkynetV2 with multi-provider LLM support, advanced search capabilities, and intelligent tool orchestration.
install_msg: Thanks for adding Scarecr0w12's cogs! Available cogs: SkynetV2. Use [p]cog install Scarecr0w12-Cogs <cogname> to install individual cogs.
